name: So Watt?!
description:
So Watt?!

A Hex-based puzzle game with power management mechanics!

This was as a 48-hour Game-Jam project @ AIE Adelaide where the theme was "There is not enough _______"

How to play:

  • Rotate tiles with Left/Right mouse
  • Connect the power grid from the power plant (bottom left) to the capitol building (top right) while including special buildings in your network!

Credits:

 Lukasz Dziedziczak, Euan Wynne-Jones,  Flynn Eickhoff,  Heather Barnett, Ben Rushby, Matthew Watkins

Special thanks to the Staff at AIE who organized this event and supported us throughout the weekend!
